events.message: I just filed a claim for my car after it got rear-ended at a traffic light yesterday afternoon.
The submitted auto accident claim has been categorized appropriately under auto insurance coverage.
An agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will be reaching out soon.
We have acknowledged your claim and appreciate you providing the accident details promptly.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and your driver’s license to proceed.
All requested documents including accident photos and police report were successfully uploaded today.
Our claims team has started the investigation to assess the collision damage and liability factors.
The investigation concluded that your vehicle’s damage was caused by the other driver's negligence.
We have proposed a settlement offer covering the repair costs for your car minus the deductible.
You provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the communication but concern about processing time.
Your auto accident claim has been approved for the proposed settlement amount without any changes.
The settlement payment has been issued and will be transferred to your account within 3 business days.
Your claim has been officially closed following successful payment and vehicle repair confirmation.
The records for your auto accident claim have been archived securely in our system for future reference.
